lead_paragraph: The sight of Welsh players bringing kids on to the pitch after their quarter-final victory over Belgium at the European Championship last week may have warmed the hearts of millions around the world, but for UEFA it appears to have been a step too far.

headline.print_headline: UEFA Tells Wales to Keep Their Children Off the Pitch
headline.main: UEFA Tells Wales to Keep Their Children Off the Pitch
